{{Wired embedded system |brand=Hardkernel |model=ODROID-N2 |revision=(4GB) |asin=B07S655F4X |manuf_country=Korea |is_manuf=Yes |availability=Currently Shipping |price=79 |est_release_date=04/2019 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Amlogic |cpu1_model=S922X |cpu1_cspeed=1.8-1.9 GHz |cpu1_cores=6 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25U6435FM2I-10G |fla2=512 KiB |fla2_brand=ISSI |fla2_model=IS25LQ512B |ram1=4 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4A8G165WC-BCTD |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 (OTG), USB 3.0 (Type A) |expansion_usb_num=5 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 1.8V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211F |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=CMOS Real Time Clock;NXP;PCF8563;;1;,,, USB 3.1 Gen 1 Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL3523;;1;,,, 3-Vrms Audio Driver with Adjustable Gain;DIOO Micro;DIO2133;;1;,,, 3.3V 8A Synchronous Buck Converter w/ 100mA LDO;MPS;NB680;;1;,,, 5V, 8A Synchronous Buck Converter w/ 100mA LDO;MPS;NB679;;1;,,, 18V, 2A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Silergy Corp;SY8120B;;2;,,, 500mA Bypass Capacitor CMOS LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9013;;2;,,, 300mA LDO Adjustable Regulator w/ Enable;Richtek;RT9179;;1;,,, 26V, 6A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP8756;;2;,,, 2-Channel ESD Protection for USB 3.0;TI;TPD2EUSB30;;8;,,, USB Power Distribution Switch;First Silicon;FC9516A;;1;,,, 300mA CMOS Linear Regulator;First Silicon;FC8731;;2;,,, Low Power Voltage Detector;Torex;XC61FN2712MR;;1;,,, 0.2A Single Channel Load Switch;Diodes Inc;AP2331;;1;,,, 1.7A Programmable Current-Limited Power Distribution Switch;MPS;MP62551;;4; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, eMMC module connector, HDMI 2.0, SPDIF out, Audio/CVBS, IR receiver, RTC w/ battery backup, GPIO, SPI, I2C, ADC header, fan headers, heatsink |stock_boot=U-Boot;2015.01; |stock_os=Linux;4.9.162-22;Ubuntu 18.04.2 LTS; |tp_firmware=Arch Linux (Arm), Android PIE, Armbian, DietPi, Volumio |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=odroid |default_pass=odroid |oui_eth=00:1E:06 }} {{TagLine|Single Board Computer - ODROID-N2}} :[https://www.hardkernel.com/shop/odroid-n2-with-4gbyte-ram/ Product page]
eMMC module connector with modules of 8GB, 16GB, 32GB, 64GB and 128GB available. {{See also|ODROID#Models|List of Single-board computers}}
===Links=== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ODROID ''ODROID'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://wiki.odroid.com/odroid-n2/odroid-n2 ''ODROID-N2'' on '''ODROID''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2019/02/13/odroid-n2-amlogic-s922x-sbc/ ''ODROID-N2 Amlogic S922X SBC'' on '''CNX|Software''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Amlogic]] S922X (ARMv8-A) :4x ARM (Cortex-A73) @1.8GHz and :2x ARM (Cortex-A53) @1.9HGz *GPU: Mali-G52 @864MHz *RAM: 4GB (DDR4) @1320MHz *Storage: SDHC Card slot, :eMMC 4.5 connector
<!-- ===See also=== *[[ODROID-C0]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C1]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C1+]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C2]] - ''Amlogic'' S905 4-cores ARM Cortex-A53 CPU @2.0GHz *[[ODROID-GO]] - ''Espressif Systems'' ESP32 Dual Core LX6 @240MHz *[[ODROID-H2]] - ''Intel'' J4105 4-cores Celeron @2.5GHz *[[ODROID-HC1]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-HC2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-N2]] - ''Amlogic'' S922X 4-cores ARM Cortex-A73 @1.8GHz ::::::and 2-cores ARM Cortex-A53 @1.9GHz CPU *[[ODROID-U2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-U3]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-X]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.4GHz *[[ODROID-X2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-XU]] - "Samsung" Exynos 5410 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @1.6GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.2GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU3]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU3 Lite]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @1.8GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.3GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU4]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU --> __NOTOC__
